title: My personal opinion
text:
Usually, when i see online shopping apps or websites with prices usually lower than 10$ (thats cheap) i think that the clothes or items they offer will end up being low quality as ever.
but unlike romwe, u guys actually make good quality clothing at amazingly low prices. 
one thing i dont like, is that sometimes clothes will come in the mail not being sewn in some parts, or having imperfections like rips or small things that arent it- butttt if i were to return it it would be super fast!!
when i return something from SHEIN, the process goes very quick and i get my money back fast, which i love love love
but yeah, theres some other things that they need to get better with like sometimes the items might be low quality or not last very long, but overall very good job sheinnn

title: Definitely hit or miss
text: Shein's products are very hit and miss on fit and quality for sure. I've ordered quite a few things from there and most I'd say I do end up sending back, but what I've kept I like very much and it's super CHEAP! Shipping (to U.S.) does take forever so if you are ordering for a specific occasion definitely order a few weeks ahead of time and don't always expect for it to be exactly what you imagined it would be. So if your ordering like a dress for a wedding or something and you get it just in the nick of time I'd definitely have s back up outfit plan just in case it doesn't fit or look like in the picture. I like that you can get points for reviewing and uploading pictures of their clothes and use those towards future purchases. I don't necessarily like that when you return items it goes into a shein wallet instead of back on your card, but again you can use it towards future purchases.

title: What should I do?
text: I‚Äôve bought off of shein a lot and it‚Äôs a great app but recently someone somehow got into my account, I found this out because there was multiple things in my cart which I didn‚Äôt put in for example this bracelet for soccer which I don‚Äôt play soccer and another bracelet that said ‚Äúwhat would Jesus do‚Äù and I‚Äôm not Christian so i don‚Äôt know how that got into there. There was also an email put on my account that wasn‚Äôt mine and I didn‚Äôt put an email on that account. The person that logged into my account they probably didn‚Äôt know what they were doing but they now have my PayPal information and my address.  I‚Äôve tried getting rid of all my information on that account and I logged back into it to see if it was there and my information was still there. I have no idea what to do and the help center doesn‚Äôt answer this so what should I do?

title: Love it but the delivery and points üòû
text: Trust me when I say I love this app I mean it. I have spent over 200 dollars on this app. ü´¢Great products and everything. But here are the cons:üòî you can‚Äôt use All of your points on purchases. I have 729 points and I want to buy something that is 1.78. Unfortunately I can only 70% of points.üò≠Therefor you still have to pay with cash+shipping.üòíGood thing is that on Sunday‚Äôs there is free shipping on ALL Orders no matter what cost.üòÆ‚Äçüí®  I wish that we could use 100% of our points. üôÅ also a recent problem that I have been having is delayed delivery. My other package that I ordered later on arrived on Tuesday.üò≥ Shien pls do your thing and  fix this or ima have to return this. üò©

title: Awesome!!
text:
When i first saw shein i saw their clothes which looked absolutely amazing and affordable. The prices were super cheap and i bought them instantly. Although i was a little skeptical because the clothes were very cute but also cheap when the prices would have been around over $25 on any other website. I ordered 5 clothes and they were sooo cute! The shipping time is quite long but was so worth the wait. I got a a pair of pants and a few hoodies that look great. Also bought shoes that fit perfectly. I havent had a single bad experience with shein (i mean this was my only purchase so far) and would recommend buying anything they have to offer. Great deals and quality too! 

Side note: i bought a few more things from shein that i cant wait to arrive! Gets here on april 16, ill let you know how it goes.

title: Amazing
text: Shein is the best thing ever to happen to me clothing wise! As a fifth grader in middle school it‚Äôs really hard to save up to buy for new clothes while still trying to save up for other things and shein is the best thing for this it has the best most in Trend clothes and it‚Äôs not even shein has the best clothes if shein has it it‚Äôs the best clothes it is amazing I love it so much it‚Äôs like I can get a three dollar shirt and what time I got a three dollar shirt and I got 10 compliments on it one time I got a $50 shirt and I got one so yeah shein is amazing and it‚Äôs the best thing is it doesn‚Äôt only have clothes it also has make up an organization and pens so I don‚Äôt want to go to some like paper source  and buy $50 pack of Golden pens I wanna go to Shein by like a cool pack of like key pens or ring pens and they‚Äôre amazing I love it so much definitely would recommend

title: ** The Best Online Shopping App **
text:
When it comes to buying clothes online for cheap I run to this app!! This app makes it more affordable to buy clothes that are trendy, stylish, and just what you‚Äôre looking. From the points to the coupons to the offers and deals it‚Äôs overall one of the most used and unique shopping apps available, not only in the United States. There‚Äôs nothing bad I can even say about this app because it‚Äôs perfect, I mean sure there are some small details that could be improved but the app it‚Äôs self is easy to navigate and easy to use. Purchasing couldn‚Äôt really be any easier, you can pay all sorts of ways, even with points! 

|| ** I‚Äôm not sure if this is true but I have been seeing and hearing all over the internet that this app is stealing designs from other creators??
*** IM NOT SURE IF THIS IS TRUE ***

title: Pretty Good
text: I would say that overall SHEIN is a pretty good opportunity to get clothes for cheaper when you don‚Äôt have a lot of money to afford big store brands. I will say that the quality of the material is not always the highest but it is pretty average for the most part. There are almost always coupon codes that you can use to save money and on top of that you can earn points and use that towards your purchase! One thing I will say is ALWAYS read the reviews because they will often include pictures of everyday people wearing the clothes and on top of that they often list their size and measurements so you will know how it fits and if you should size up or down. Only annoyance is that every time I open the app I have to wait like 15 seconds for an ad to be over before I can actually use the app and it gets kind of annoying. The clothes are cute though!!

title: Love it.
text: I‚Äôve been using SHEIN for about two years now, the prices are perfect. You have to be smart, check the sizing chart, look at customer reviews on the items and be rational. Most of the items run a little bit small. It depends what you‚Äôre picking out. I am a size small in most tops, usually a medium (4-6) in bottoms. I almost always order one size up on each. I‚Äôve probably made about 8 shipments at this point from them, and I‚Äôve found something to be unwearable only when I‚Äôve gotten the wrong size maybe twice. There are VERY few things I didn‚Äôt like on me, or things that were too small that I either returned (easy) or gave to a friend. You get what you pay for. But this is a great way to sample so many different styles for every season without emptying your wallet. Shipping has been updated and it‚Äôs also faster these days. I promise you‚Äôll be happy.

title: Problems that can be fixed
text: I don‚Äôt really like SHEIN but there is somethings wrong I have ordered an outfit and it came out pretty nice I really liked it but that is not the issue my issue is I had forgot my password after I ordered my outfit and when I tried to get in there into my account it logged me out and also when I try to do the reset email or password so I did that and when it said that to my email I keep saying try again later and I think that there is a problem somewhere I don‚Äôt know if I am the only one but that really turned my review to a sort of negative one I really think this is a great app but it should be a few things fixed I just want to get in my account in order in have fun looking at clothes and trying to see if I want to buy anything else my outfit came out nice and I think this app is a really good app but just please please fix all of the tweaks and I know it says that you fix some glitches but it hasn‚Äôt really worked out for a while

title: My FAVORITE place to buy DIY/Craft Supplies!
text:
SHEIN is seriously my *Favorite* app and place to purchase pretty much all of my DIY/Crafting supplies! They have almost everything I need (about 95% of it), with the exception of liquid items, like glue & epoxy resin‚Äîthough, they DO have a ton of amazing resin Molds! üòç
And the BEST part, is that everything is very affordable! 
They also do a LOT of promotions/sales (they have sales on items, Free Shipping promos or BOTH like every single day), so you can save even MORE on your purchases. 
I tend to wait until I can afford to make a bigger purchase during a sale on the items, so I can take advantage of those PLUS Free shipping, and it really pays off. 
There have been *very few* items that I haven‚Äôt been super pleased with (but not in a major way, by any means) and I‚Äôve ordered a LOT of stuff though then! But even if you‚Äôre not entirely happy with an item, it‚Äôs so inexpensive that it‚Äôs not a big issue. Though, they do offer a FREE return the first time you do one (I personally haven‚Äôt felt the need to return anything yet). 
If you‚Äôre into ANY type of Craft, do nail art as a profession or hobby, or just love shipping good deals on clothing, accessories, shoes, etc. (for ANY gender/age!) then you‚Äôve found the RIGHT app! üòç‚ô•Ô∏èüòç‚ô•Ô∏è
Hope this was helpful to you üòÅ

title: Horrible delivery
text: This app is easy to use and has cheap clothes. Although their customer service is very polite, they are far from accommodating. They sent out a delivery to my home in atlanta and when i get the notification from USPS saying its undelivered, they notify me to contact the sender. When I talked to the representative from Shein, they said that I need to coordinate it with USPS?! how am i supposed to work on that? They are basically throwing me back and forth with no solution. How come domestic delivery could be this troublesome? And why can‚Äôt shein just put the label on the package to tell them to let the customer to pick up if something is wrong with the address? (which is not the case here, i have ordered countless things online and never had any problem until i ordered stuff from shein). It‚Äôs a lot easier and makes more sense. They should have overseeing the delivery as well as the customer has no control of it in any way. I have seen a lot of people have the same complaint, at this point, I would have changed the courier if I were them.

title: Let Me Count The Ways!
text:
Oh how I LOVE Sheen! Let me count the ways.
I love them for their many different styles. Because I have granddaughters with many different tastes. I love the fact that I can shop from the comfort of my own home. I love all of their home products with all the different things to organize my kitchen, vanity and office. I love their jewelry and most of all I love their prices. I have seen people complain about quality, I can tell you I am the one who comes out on the winning end of this. Sure I have received an item or two that wasn‚Äôt exactly what I have expected but I have received many more items that met or exceeded my expectations. I will continue to purchase from this company for as long as they continue to have the thing I am looking for.
Thank you Sheen! This 62 year old granny thinks you are the BOMB!

title: Love it
text: I love this app so much. They have affordable, good clothes for men, women, and kids. They also have a whole bunch of other stuff. They even have home decor. One major thing I will say though about the clothes is that you HAVE TO CHECK THE MEASUREMENTS. For example, something might be a medium, but the bust is 28in. Also, check the reviews ofc, to see what other people say. Sometimes it runs large, small, etc. Sometimes it‚Äôs a little thinner or more cropped than expected. They have a size thing that you can do (if you can‚Äôt find it on the app just look it up) and it will show you your likely sizes based on your measurements and your size compared to other brands. Then, it will tell you specifically what your size most likely is. But, if other people say it runs large or smaller, don‚Äôt go off what it tells you.

title: Amazing quality, good price and fast shipping! What more do you want/need?
text:
Quality ‚úîÔ∏è 
Affordable ‚úîÔ∏è‚úîÔ∏è 
Fast Shipping ‚úîÔ∏è
Sales ‚úîÔ∏è‚úîÔ∏è‚úîÔ∏è 
I absolutely love SHEIN. I have made multiple orders and everything has been good quality and it lasts and it looks great. I receive multiple compliments throughout the day and who doesn‚Äôt love a good compliment? The clothes are quality, from dresses to pants or skirts to jackets or simple T-shirts to blouses, they haven‚Äôt failed me on the quality or the price. They almost always have a sale too! 
The shipping is quick also, I was a little skeptical the first time because it said it was shipping from overseas (in California - shipping from China) but every single order has made it to my doorstep within 3 days. Everyone at my job (small office - mostly women) know exactly who to come to when they need a dress or an outfit for something upcoming - I have been dubbed the outlet and I‚Äôm proud of it. Gotta keep my girls looking good too.
 I will be a long time customer and I have and will continue to recommend SHEIN to everyone! 
Thank you for high quality and low price clothes, SHEIN! 
Believe it or not, I wrote this review strictly because I‚Äôm impressed, grateful and a loyal customer - I didn‚Äôt even get paid for this and I never review. Simply doing it because I need every woman to know where to get the looks üëèüèΩ

title: Just ok
text: To order items from SHEIN can be a crab shoot. Sometimes you really nice things and sometimes it‚Äôs just crappy merchandise. I used to order all the time, until they started charging me a international shipping fee on my card. They didn‚Äôt do that before. I was a pretty loyal customer and really enjoyed most of my purchases. As for returning the items, my printer died so I have to find another way to return some of my items.i don‚Äôt have a label. I did mention this to them, but with customer service not understanding English, you get the run around. Also I mentioned to people who want to order from them, make sure you pay the .99 fee. If you don‚Äôt, you could get the wrong items, size or it‚Äôll never get delivered. So recently most of my items have been the wrong size bad quality and looks nothing like the picture. Also when they say you get 20% discount on your purchase, you‚Äôre not getting that discount. If you pay at least $50 for your purchase, shouldn‚Äôt you receive a discount of $10? Not $7 or $8?

title: LOVE IT
text: I love this app. I was skeptical at first because of the prices but when i first ordered and got my stuff & it looked exact like the pictures & the clothing quality was good i just knew from there i would be ordering from here again. Also shipping is very fast when they say express shipping believe it you will literally get your stuff in 2 days depending on when you ordered. The customer service is great & they work with you. I had ordered something & they sent me a email informing me that the item was out of stock & that i could replace it with something else or they would just refund me the money for that particular item. I love love love this app it‚Äôs so many cute things makes you want to order everything. Now i can say sizing can be a little tricky but overall this is a good app to order nice clothes & shoes from for cheap & don‚Äôt forget the coupons

title: Not a Scam
text: I‚Äôve had a SHEIN account for a long time but in 2019 is where I started to actually buy their product. If you don‚Äôt get the size you wanted most likely you measured yourself wrong. Do not click M or S or L right away. SHEIN provides measurements, comments, the likelihood of the product you are looking at in a percentage. It‚Äôs all there. Yes there were some clothes I didn‚Äôt like because it didn‚Äôt match or I would rather have it more loose or tighter. It‚Äôs not a scam and if you don‚Äôt like something you can return it. Obviously undergarments cannot be returned. Their coupons and the point system is really awesome unlike others like forever 21 or ulta. Their makeup is good and some are gems. I‚Äôve been buying my eyeliner and it‚Äôs the only one that I truly love and it costs 4-5 dollars. Saves money and hard not to buy anything.

title: On a slow boat from China
text: I shopped on the site to buy clothes for my trip to Barcelona‚Ä¶ ended up using them a few months later in Jamaica snd recently ordered again after telling myself NEVER again and will use these items next year or in Greece, not sure yet. Yes‚Ä¶ I travel a lot and don‚Äôt want to bring really expensive items while doing so. The quality is what I need for going out, getting a certain look matched with expensive accessories and viola who is the wiser?!? My issue with this company is the horrible shipping. I have NEVER gotten my orders in under a month. WTH?!?! The return policy is ridiculous. One reviewer lied and said she was able to return and to get money back in her account. I will just repeat myself for the people in customer service, not customer care‚Ä¶ because they don‚Äôt care about the customer.  DO BETTER!!! I love the fashions I‚Äôve been in this industry for over 40 years from modeling professionally at 14 to running multiple high end boutiques.

title: Love Love Love
text: Shein gets put down a lot and people tend to put down people that buy from shein a lot but in reality it‚Äôs a great app it‚Äôs cheap not everyone has the money to get expensive products or clothes and shein gives low cost products. Some of these products and clothes are just the same as when you buy something expensive , it‚Äôs like ross or tj max stores like those and people shop there everyday so the hate that shein gets i don‚Äôt really get i love it i‚Äôve bought lashes dresses etc and i love them . yes their clothes can be cheap made and they products too but as far as i‚Äôve seen and bought they are great you just need to know your size and always look at the review‚Äôs people out up they help so much if a you should size bigger or lower i love this app and i‚Äôll be buying more without a doubt. !!!

title: Great Clothes!
text: I understand why some people are skeptical about buying from Shein‚Äîthe prices are ridiculously affordable! And for some reason people tend to associate cheap prices with cheap quality‚Äîbut that is typically not the case at all with Shein. I have been buying clothes from them for several years and I don‚Äôt have any complaints! Always fast shipping. Great prices. And as long as you take time to read the item description you really shouldn‚Äôt have any issues with clothing type or fit. I always read the item description and if there are reviews on each item from other people I read through a few of those, too, if I am unsure. Plus, they always tell you the models stats that you see pictured. I buy everything from casual tees, to shoes, jewelry, bathing suits and dresses! I love them!

title: Great selection for all sizes and ages
text: I‚Äôm so glad I found Shein. I may be in my 50‚Äôs, and a few extra pounds on my frame, but it doesn‚Äôt mean I want to wear gray sacks around. Shopping in my area is pretty much non-existent and forget it if you have any sense of personal style. I‚Äôve been able to start building up my own fun and funky and comfortable style through this app. Clothes, for the most part, are well made and so cute and fit well. It may be fast fashion but I can see have most of what I buy for a long time, whereas what I but locally is more expensive and usually goes out to goodwill quickly because it‚Äôs boring  I don‚Äôt like it but it‚Äôs all that can be found here. The Shein app itself is awesome, it functions well, plenty of info on items, easy to use, earn rewards, etc. I‚Äôm very happy with this company.

title: Great products for low prices
text: Sometimes ill notice they will charge the same price as Ali express which to me is where you get the best deals around for the same products at the stores and they probably literally are the same products. SHEIN has close to everything I‚Äôm the consumer region I love it if I‚Äôm looking for a specific style and find one shirt close I‚Äôll end up finding the exact shirt I was hoping for in the recommendations. If you plan your outfits and like to find specific types of clothing and color or like finding different clothes in the style you like SHEIN is the place to go for any anf every style. Everyone can find something they like at SHEIN it‚Äôs addicting just remember so you don‚Äôt spend more then you were hoping for which is easy to do because they are such good deals. Thank you SHEIN YOUR AWESOME!!!:)

title: Love
text: I hate going shopping!!!  Finally an app that has my size!!  Literally everything I have bought has not only fit me but looked amazing.  I feel beautiful in everything I get.  The prices are amazing but the quality  is also amazing!! The best of both worlds.  Plus ima thick girl and they cater to us so well. I couldn‚Äôt say enough good things about this website  I literally tell everyone bc I‚Äôm constantly being asked,‚Äùwhere did you get that cute outfit, SHEIN girl.‚Äù  Literally She In!!   love this company and is the only place I shop now for almost everything.  This app helped me feel pretty in clothes again I was wearing nothing but black.  Black leggings, tank top and sweater.  I hated it but didn‚Äôt feel comfortable in anything  I have recently put on some weight.  SHEIN helps me feel beautiful again and not in all black. Thank you SHEIN you have a customer for life here. Luv ya xoxo

title: Great prices! Great quality! 50-50 clothes
text: I love SHEIN!!! They‚Äôre prices are insane and there‚Äôs literally always a coupon. Shipping does take a while but it‚Äôs so worth it. I‚Äôm not a huge fan of the majority of their clothes , if you can even call it that üòë It‚Äôs outrageous how revealing they are! Especially kids clothing! Little girls should not be wearing plunge swimsuits üòí Now some of their clothing is cute! They have plenty of cute vintage basics that are under 10 bucks. I just don‚Äôt love some of their other pieces. My favorite thing about SHEIN is their accessories. Jaw clips, bucket hats, anti blue light glasses, and jewelry all usually under 10 bucks! I can‚Äôt get enough of them! The app also works really well, you can get points pretty easy and use them to take a couple bucks off your order. You can also enter into competitions and make outfits. Overall SHEIN is pretty awesome! You need to check it out!

title: Never shop in a store again
text: I usually don‚Äôt write reviews but I cannot express enough how much I love this app. First off everything is Free shopping and Free Returns. This is a Chinese wholesale website however the clothing is very well made. The sizing is set up for US sizes so you don‚Äôt have to worry about something being too small. Furthermore, if someone does run small, the reviews will tell you and there‚Äôs a chart that says it runs small. Shein motivates customers to write detailed reviews in exchange for points that can be used as discounts. Similarly, the clothing items are SOO unique and cuter than anything else I would find in a local store. The shipping takes a little long but then again, if I don‚Äôt have to pay for shipping then I don‚Äôt mind. If you want quicker shipping, choose express (beggars can‚Äôt be choosers). Overall, you won‚Äôt regret this app at all!

title: Huge selection of affordable items
text:
The app is very easy to navigate. Pay attention to the reviews of the item before you buy it (sizing, is it cheap looking etc).  
You can leave a review & get Shein points which translate to Shein money. You can also check-in daily to receive points-  actually several ways to earn points- even confirming a delivery. I like how the app gives related items after you put something on your wishlist or in your cart so you can really go down a rabbit hole. Delivery is usually 9-10 days from purchase (I live in the US). Only thing is the tracking on the app is not up-to-date but Shein has a button that lets you copy the tracking number then I go to the UPS site. Huge selection! The clothes are so affordable & the jewelry is a steal! Returns are easy as well.

title: Tricky cancel/ refund/wallet situation
text: I ordered 8 items, I realized I made a mistake about the sizing. I canceled my first order in less than an hour. I corrected my sizing and I ordered the same 8 items again. I waited for my refund for the first order, it didn‚Äôt happen. I reached the customer service they said it takes a few days. I couldn‚Äôt understand because I canceled the order in an hour after I ordered. I said okay anyways. Than refund never happened. I totally forgot about it. I ordered a few times after this situation. Today I realized they did refund, but not to my credit card, the card i used when i made my purchase. They made the refund to their shein wallet without my consent!!! That‚Äôs ridiculous! And the worst thing you can‚Äôt withdraw the money. You have to buy more things and use your wallet but it gets even more ridiculous because you can‚Äôt buy things with your whole refund amount, you can only use 20% percent at a time!! I am so frustrated!! I want my money back!!!! This should be against the law!

title: Love SHEIN!
text:
I tried the app and made my first purchase with a lot of skepticism- my daughter and a couple of my friends had told me to try SHEIN. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with my experience! I am shocked at over how affordable yet how well made the clothes and shoes are, and even the shipping time is far better than expected. I have ordered twice now, totaling 2 new complete outfits from hats, tops, bottoms, and boots to accessories to complete each outfit. Everything fit perfectly and I have received several compliments from strangers while wearing my new clothes out! And the best part, is that there is more to this than just purchasing clothes as there are design contests and other features included in membership! I get coupons towards my orders and have even earned points towards free products!
I definitely recommend this app!

title: Just read if your hesitating to use this app.
text: Shein is honestly amazing, I would say its underrated but it does have an insane amount of users. The only complaints shein really has is the shipping, what I have to say about this is.. No. My packages normally arrive like 5-7 days after ordering and I dont even buy express shipping, that may be just because of where im located but I personally dont mind the wait. Sheins quality and absolutely amazing and the photos listed for some products dont do the item justice. Their bathing suits are amazing and super cheap, the jewelry doesnt turn my skin green, the clothes last long and fit amazing. A rumor went around that shein and romwe were stealing credit card info.. I have to say that was not the case for me, I feel bad for the people who lost their money but I still dont think that was shein.

title: Worth it, with minor bumps
text:
I‚Äôve had a handful of purchases from this site, each being 20+ items. The longest I‚Äôve had to wait for my package has been 15 days.

Overall, I‚Äôve loved the styles, prices and quality of the things I‚Äôve chosen. I‚Äôm usually very picky about fabric quality, but just by seeing pictures of some of the items you can tell what they‚Äôll be like irl. For me, the biggest plus is that they have very ample size selections in all styles. I think SHEIN is one of the best options for plus size clothing, and styles are either the same as those offered for standard sizes or completely unique pieces. 

I have had to return a few items because I didn‚Äôt like the fabric quality, but I haven‚Äôt had a single item look different than the pictures in the app of what I ordered. Jeans on this site are AMAZING, thick denim with quality stitching. I also love the dresses and jackets. Like I said, I can pick out quality a bit easily since I‚Äôm familiar with fabric and know what I‚Äôll look like, so I def see some items on the site that would not fit my quality standards. Also, user reviews are critical in choosing items, since they give insight as to sizing, fit, quality and overall style. 

SHEIN has become my main source of clothing, and will continue to be in the foreseeable future.

title: Truly one (1) star service!
text: Customer service is absolutely absent! There is no customer service phone number, you have to contact them by email and only after you go through 11 prompts, then you have to submit a ticket, after that they get back to you within 24 to 48 hours, then you have to send them in your ID or drivers license, then you also have to take pictures of your credit card that you used for purchase, and then they will get back to you 24 hours later, so that‚Äôs a total of 72 hours, then they will ask you for the bank statement of the credit card purchase, and I don‚Äôt know what happens after that, because I am still waiting for a reply. I didn‚Äôt download this app to make any friends, and truth be told I didn‚Äôt download this app to make enemies either. However customer service is so rude and incompetent! That I will be definitely taking my business elsewhere! Be aware!!!!!!!!! If you have any problems with this company, it will take you a minimum of 72 hours to get anywhere with them! When it should only take minutes!

title: Customer Service 10/10
text: Okay, so it‚Äôs ALWAYS scary ordering clothes online. Especially when they‚Äôre cute and wildly affordable. Lemme tell you, their customer service and returning process is easy. ESPECIALLY if they send you the wrong item or size. The latter doesn‚Äôt happen often but I did receive a size XL bikini top when I was supposed to get a M. Well, you can‚Äôt just simply return or exchange swimwear bc it‚Äôs final sale. So I thought it was going to be straight up impossible. But no. All I did was online chat with the picture of the mistake and in five minutes I had another top processing and was simply told to just keep the other one. So truly it‚Äôs a 5/5 for customer service. The clothes though? Honestly I‚Äôve been truly impressed with the quality and I‚Äôve spend about $300 so far, which for shein- is A LOT. I‚Äôve loved everything so 5/5 there too.

title: Don‚Äôt get it
text: I‚Äôve ordered a lot of clothes from here in the past before I knew about all of the bad stuff they‚Äôve done. The clothes are cheaply made, usually come wrinkled and the sizes are off most of the time. Most recently, I bought a sweater and I was really excited because it was on sale and I had been waiting to get it for a long time for my friend. I ordered it and tracked the package, a week later I got an email saying that the sweater had been sold out after I had already bought it! Why didn‚Äôt it just mark the sweater sold out before? How did it sell out after I made the purchase and why did it take so long to tell me? Shein offered to give me fifty shein points and a refund which was nice except that I spent over 200 shein points on that sweater and a coupon. That‚Äôs not really anything to complain about but the thing that bothers me the most was how they didn‚Äôt tell me until a week after I had bought the sweater. I‚Äôm not shopping there anymore and you shouldn‚Äôt either, it‚Äôs a ripoff. Also look up shein problematic to see the other stuff they‚Äôve done.

title: Appreciate the prices, not the presentation
text:
Dear Editors,

I adore the charitable project initiative and gamification efforts towards feminism. It is truly a joyful and enlightening experience and I am happy to support a brand which takes such special care and attention to empower and enlighten women. However, please be aware the age limit for you application is 12+ and the objectifying positions of the models and products being sold can be extremely provacative and send a message counter intuitive to your charitable cares initiative. An edit in the area of the positioning of the model photography and an age limit restriction on what can be viewed to purchase would be wise and commendable. We're all working together to make dreams come true and the world as it should be. I am so glad I discovered this brand and hope to see it progress in the future.

title: Misleading customers with delivery timings
text:
The first time I have ordered from SHEIN I have to admit the quality of the clothes are amazing. Now I am ordering for the second time and I have to admit there aren‚Äôt professional whatsoever regarding the time of delivery. 
I have talked to support before placing my order (in order to make sure I‚Äôm receiving it before my travel)!!!! she informed me about the express delivery business days to the country I‚Äôm living in which was ‚Äú3-8 days‚Äù after processing. 
After placing the order, it got proceed within one or two days, and it said it has been shipped, I talked to the support again to check the  shipment expected delivery date, and informed that from the date it was shipped it needs 10-30 days to be delivered ???! Are you kidding me ??? I have to wait one month after I paid extra money for express delivery and I won‚Äôt be even in the country! 
If you knew it would be late you were suppose to inform me from the beginning regarding it. 
This is called MISLEADING AND UNPROFESSIONAL ATTITUDE AND BEHAVIOR! Extremely DISAPPOINTED!!!

title: Cheaply made
text:
The app‚Äôs search function isn‚Äôt great‚Äîlots of filters, but the results don‚Äôt always correlate to the filters you selected, and sometimes after viewing an item and then going back to the search results you have to do the whole search/filter process over again to bring back the list of results you were working with a minute ago. 
And, things go out of stock incredibly quickly. If you bought one size and it didn‚Äôt fit, don‚Äôt expect to be able to buy a different size of the same dress a week later. 
And, I realize this doesn‚Äôt bother everyone, but it bothers me so I‚Äôll mention it: the grammar is atrocious to the point where some things don‚Äôt even make sense. It doesn‚Äôt cost that much to hire an editor to make sure your website and customer service communications look professional, and the lack of attention to detail/accuracy feed into my expectation of low quality. 

Now for the clothing review: in addition to buying some, myself, I examined a TON of Shein clothes back when I worked for a thrift store. They scream ‚Äúpoor quality.‚Äù However nice it looks in photos, be prepared for it to be thin and semi-rough-feeling fabric; half the items need a slip in order to be wearable in public. One dress I received had a seam coming apart right in front.
They run true to size unless you have a small bust or narrow shoulders, in which case anything off-the-shoulder may not stay up.

I would never recommend this company to anyone.

title: Couldn‚Äôt have found Shein at a better time!
text: It‚Äôs no secret that no matter where you‚Äôre at in the world, money is getting tight for the majority of people in the world. Harder to keep gas in your car, harder to afford those nice meals at a restaurant, harder to keep all your paid subscriptions and even hard to pay for necessities like food and shelter. SHEIN is the lowest priced website that I‚Äôve ever heard of all around, and they take their business seriously. Everything is thorough and as fast as it could possibly be considering all that goes into getting everyone there correct orders and in a timely manner. I would recommend Shein whether you‚Äôre struggling with money a little, down to your last and trying to make ends meet, or wealthy but still want inexpensive things to enjoy. 12/10

title: My experience shopping
text: I like SHEIN. The quality of their items is solid it‚Äôs durable. I have to say when scrolling not only through women but men‚Äôs clothes too. The choice of models and the clothes they wear is rather upsetting. The models  especially of men can be very feminine in clothes and can be  alarming to see when scrolling. I personally don‚Äôt like when these pop up they make me feel uncomfortable like if I don‚Äôt get a say in what I want to see. If there was a setting to were I could feel comfortable and not see any of theses models and what there wearing I would use it.  I‚Äôm pretty upset that SHEIN is wet no to have one of theses options. For not only me but many other people like me were to like and use this setting. This isn‚Äôt just a bother to me but young children that shop on this app they see this. I personally think this is a bad influence on those of religious families or just more conservative families. This is just my opinion but I would like to see improvements.

title: SHEIN app
text: SHEIN is an amazing app, and I love it without question! I have gotten half of my closet from SHEIN, and I don‚Äôt know what I would do without it. there have been times where I ordered the wrong size, but I still made it work and it looked cute. Some of their clothing material feels kind of funky, but for the most part, it‚Äôs incredible I highly recommend sheen for every young or old person. Some people read the clothing as bad or good, but you never know what to expect until you get it. Even if you get the wrong size, color, etc. you still get a refund and you could get your money back. I have used SHEIN for my whole middle school and high school years. I have trusted SHEIN and she has never failed me. I love this app and all of the clothing that comes with it. I highly recommend five out of five.

title: ATTENTION SHEIN EMPLOYEES
text:
The 1 star is just to get she in employees attention. Im sorry! Y‚Äôall are the best BUT‚Ä¶.. Y‚Äôall have to bring your serious A-game this winter. The designers at SHEIN are by the most excellent designers in my opinion the whole clothing facade online market web. That is why I am counting on y‚Äôall this winter‚Ä¶. Do something that is never been brought to the table. It‚Äôs time to spice things up in the winter department. The xs to l is pretty good but the plus size winter department is screaming for help!! We‚Äôre dying over here in our hot sweaters. I trust y‚Äôall so much more then any other clothing site I only shop on she in. The prices are so good compared to quality and just uniqueness literally though I am lucky because I can wear some of thee large clothes in the normal women‚Äôs department but please please help the other ladies and me this winter. We need sexy winter clothes!!!! I‚Äôm counting on you!!!! The clothes is what makes us big girls look good. So if we only have big baggy clothes uh huh it‚Äôs not gonna b supreme.

Ps I have more 5 star reviews added to outweigh 1 star! please help!

title: Love it!
text: I recently got this after a friend recommended it and I was almost positive it was going to be a complete sham, but I was very pleasantly surprised that all of the clothing is very cute and extremely cheap! I don‚Äôt know how they get such low prices, but all their clothing super trendy and super affordable. I also love how the give tons of information on sizing (such as the dimensions of the model, how big the XS is compared to the S, ect.). This makes it much easier to see how the clothing will fit you before buying it. There‚Äôs always some sort of deal or discount that you can get, and the only thing that I would like to change is the SHEIN Points that you can earn to put towards buying more products. After a while they expire and this is kind of frustrating after you have so many build up and they just go away, but even with this, I really love this app and would totally recommend getting it!

title: 1 Month return still no refund
text:
If you order the wrong look or they just don‚Äôt have another size to exchange for then expect to wait awhile for a refund. As I am writing this my 1 month(30 day) return order still has not been refunded. When I head over to customer support, I am faced with an automated robot. When attempting to ‚Äúsubmit a ticket‚Äù there is no option and I get reverted back to the robot who has no knowledge of my return. It‚Äôs not until you head over to the return section that I still see the return processing and with no update or no way of asking if something has happened. Safe to say I just got scammed for $150. Never purchasing from here again, and I plan on seeing a lawyer to figure out how to settle this and get my money back being that the app offers me no other options.

Edit: After developer response, I would like to state that the response given only leads you to an automated robot who sends you in a never ending loop. There is no way to get a hold of an actual human.

title: Shein<3
text: I love this app very much . Probably the app I buy clothing and accessories from the most. And very cheap which is good because I‚Äôm broke most of the time. But please keep in mind that cheap will most likely give you kind of good to decent to kind of bad quality. But that doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs bad or ok all the time . They have some really cute stuff and they keep up with trends . But it will cost you a little more (like US 30-50$) for better quality for pants, shirts, hoodies, cardigans, etc. The only reason it‚Äôs four stars is for the really cheap stuff the quality is noticeably lower and I‚Äôve experienced shirts being different colors than what was ordered. Other than that it‚Äôs a pretty good app for some clothes that are trendy, chic, and questionable. Before I go I will just say one more thing ! Stan BTS, Twice, Enhypen, TXT, stray kids, LE SSERAFIM, Ateez, All Nct‚Äôs, and Ive for clear skin and good grades üòçü§û.

title: This app is one of the best.
text: This app has tons of varieties of clothes and usually their clothes have good material as well as other stuff when you receive the clothes. The only thing I do not like about this app is the shipping fee. It is like 4 dollars to pay for shipping without the price of your clothes. If they didn‚Äôt have a shipping fee I would give this app five stars because it is fantastic. You get lots of coupons, which can always benefit to free shipping. The models are gorgeous, and the clothes are fantastic! I haven‚Äôt really tried any of their jewelry but I‚Äôm sure they are just as good. Sometimes it‚Äôs frustrating because The clothes and other items take so long to ship, but the advantage is you can add as many things as you want in your cart and your will receive them eventually. I love this app just wish they had free shipping! This is a definitely recommend app for anything and anyone! üíñ

title: issues
text: this app is so so slow no matter how good your cell service is the package tracking never really works and it has said my package has been out for delivery for 3 days it gets annoying not knowing when it will be delivered, the notifications never go away and when it says there‚Äôs news the news page never pulls up it just stays as a plain white page. A lot of the coupons don‚Äôt ever work even if it‚Äôs ones that are allowed with your item. the products are normally good for but the service is a little iffy sometimes i wonder if it would be quicker and easier to buy things from other websites after trying to contact customer service all i got was an email in like chinese that didn‚Äôt answer my question in the slightest it should me my order and that it was out for delivery but it has said that sense the 11th and todays the 15th but still no package

title: Just read
text: So I‚Äôm a big thrift shop person I like old clothes from time to time I‚Äôll go to Zara and H&m my friend always had cute tops and bags so she always told me Shein have good stuff to check it out never listened to her cuz I really hate online shopping one day out of curiosity I just ordered some super cute bathing suits off Shein and boy oh boy I kept going they give you discounts daily if you read the size chart you‚Äôll never get something too small pay attention to the sizing fast shipping I even had issues where my package was stolen and they re shipped the items out it‚Äôs legit and the quality is good I mean the jewelry is 1 dollar and Zara and all these places selling the same stuff for 20 dollars if my review is not enough then you‚Äôre going to miss out I haven‚Äôt thrifted in a while Shein did that

title: I wish I could have the SHEIN app as my personal closet!!!
text: I love SHEIN I wish I could getLiterally everything. I have like 8000 things saved on my wish list or my ‚ù§Ô∏è list I have spent hours just scrolling and heartingThrough each category. and they literally have every style for every different kind of person in the world and size is awesome. And always take pictures of your perfect outfits for every occasions ,mood, or holiday, !! I love SHEIN so much!!!!

title: Items Never Delivered and Refund was not given
text: Used to like shein the only reason I did a haul was because everything came at once. First time since being a customer they decided to switch shipping vendors and my items came in 3 packages. Received the first which was small my jacket in my mailbox. The second said it was signed but never delivered so I began a dispute. They refunded me for two dresses and then the same happened with the 3rd which had 3 more dresses. Went to dispute those items never received and they said they would check with the shipping distributor and but emailed me saying it was delivered‚Ä¶ how?????? I didn‚Äôt even get the second package how did the 3rd deliver? I requested they resend the items over a refund since those dresses for for work.  They stopped responding to my inquiry and I‚Äôm even more frustrated about that. I‚Äôm deleting the app and will shop online elsewhere going forward. I also plan to make a report to the BBB because I see this is the same issues other customers are having.

title: Love It Here!  I gave you 4.3 star rating
text: I absolutely love their kids clothing and prices . Everything I‚Äôve ordered thus far has been just as described on the site. The plus clothing are very fashionable and accurate to size. And I really love that there are colors and prints of many different choice in the plus sizes. The ordering process is simple and easy to maneuver through. If I had to say anything negative at all it would only be about the way several packages are stuffed in a box all together and that some of the wall decor and jewelry got bent/damaged during the delivery process. But even those things were minor and easy to repair. Overall I‚Äôm totally obsessed with this store and have and will continue to shop here for as long as I can afford to. P.S. The coupons are insane savings on already low affordable priced  products . Thanks SHEIN I absolutely LOVE IT HERE!!!!!!!
